text: Writing late at night? Dark Theme is available in Settings.
Do you love spreadsheets as much as I do? Probably not, but you can still use Character Sheets! They're a great way to organize data about your characters.
Thought of an awesome one-liner, but afraid you'll forget it? Keep it in your Snippets page.
openworldcrafter is open source! If you'd like to help make it better (even if you can't code),
Use the Relationships tab to keep track of who's related to whom. It's very useful for avoiding your protagonist's in-laws.
Love openworldcrafter? Hate it? Found a bug? Want a feature?
Losing track of time? Use a timeline! It'll sort your events for you, and it even supports custom calendars.
Did you know you can add headers, lists, quotes, and even tables to your notes?
